snippet: Defying opposition, Ukraine lawmakers on Tuesday gave tentative approval to a bill that would allow the use of Russian in official settings alongside Ukrainian in some regions.
abstract: Ukraine's pro-government lawmakers, defying strong opposition, give tentative approval to a bill that would allow the use of the Russian language in official settings alongside Ukrainian in some regions
lead_paragraph: Defying opposition, Ukraine lawmakers on Tuesday gave tentative approval to a bill that would allow the use of Russian in official settings alongside Ukrainian in some regions.

headline.main: Ukraine: Russian Language Law Wins First Passage in Parliament
headline.print_headline: Ukraine: Russian Language Law Wins First Passage in Parliament
